History of the company

Entri is an app developed in Kasargod and focuses on equipping students with concepts for PSC exams for the five states of south India i.e. Karnataka, Telangana, Andhra Pradesh, Kerala, and Tamil Nadu. With s subscription fee, users get access to video classes, exams, previous year question papers and study cards in their mother tongues. The app also comes with the feature of chapterwise exams for students to evaluate their weak areas. Apart from PSC, the app has study materials on exams like UGC NET, Banking and Insurance, Railway, and Staff Selection Commission. Read more at: https://yourstory.com/companies/entri

Work at company

It is the first startup from India to enter LearnLaunch Accelerator. ENTRI was founded in 2015 by Mohammed Hisamuddin, who had previously co-founded SMSGYAN, along with Rahul Ramesh who founded the Kochi Python Developers group at Kochi, India.
